testcase.name: Soap API Test Case 1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ...................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"] ......................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"][0] ...................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == [ "Microsoft-IIS/7.5"] ............... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/7.5" ............... passed * print responseType ...................................................... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "98.6" .......................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 98.6 ...................... passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime < 1000 .............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed

testcase.name: Soap API Test Case 2

charset=utf-8" ...................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When soap action "http://tempuri.org/Add" ................................. passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["X-AspNet-Version"] ............................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"][0] ...................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == [ "Microsoft-IIS/8.0"] ............... passed * match responseHeaders["X-AspNet-Version"][0] == "2.0.50727" ............. passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/8.0" ............... passed * print responseType ...................................................... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "50" ............................................ passed * match response //AddResult == 50 ........................................ passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime < 1000 .............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed
